intro: Psychotria bequaertii, commonly known as the Congo psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The plant is characterized by its dark green, elliptical leaves and produces small, clustered white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland rainforests. Psychotria bequaertii is notable for its potential ethnobotanical uses, though its medicinal properties remain under study.
